result.execSummary:
The defendant Miranda North was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Court ordered applicable costs, fees and surcharges (including DNA) to be paid by 03-28-2016. Failure to pay will result in a civil judgment.
Court ordered defendant to serve 3 days in the House of Correction with 3 days credit for time served. TIME SERVED DISPOSITION.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Miranda North

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Sentencing proceeded.   Statements made as to sentencing.   

Court ordered defendant to serve 3 days in the House of Correction, with 3 days credit for time served.  TIME SERVED DISPOSITION.

Court ordered applicable costs, fees and surcharges (including DNA) to be paid by 03/28/2016.  Failure to pay will result in a civil judgment.

Court advised defendant of his right to seek postconviction relief.

Filed:
Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief;
Ineligible Voting Notice & Acknowledgement;
Pretrial Incarceration Credit

Case in court for final pre-trial, however parties would like to proceed with a plea hearing instead.  Jury trial date of 10/21/2015 is vacated.
  Defendant changes his plea to GUILTY.  Defendant examined as to his plea, advised of his Constitutional rights and the maximum penalty.   Defendant advised that if not a United States Citizen, deportation is possible.  Court found that defendant knowingly, voluntarily and intelligently waived his rights.  Guilty Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights and Addendum received and filed.  Parties stipulate to the complaint as a factual basis to sustain defendant's plea.  Court found defendant guilty and ordered a Judgment of Conviction be entered on the record.

Defendant Miranda North in court with attorney Rodney L. Cubbie.  Student Intern Daniel Murphy under the supervision of Randy P. Sitzberger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Filed, original amended information; copy served on defendant.  Defendant acknowledges receipt of information, waives formal reading, pleads not guilty.  
Court ordered charge amended to Possession of Marijuana (THC), contrary to Wisconsin Statutes sections 961.41(3g)(e), a U Misdemeanor.

Defendant Miranda North in court with attorney Rodney L. Cubbie.  Randy P. Sitzberger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  For reasons stated on the record, the Court grants the State motion to adjourn jury trial.  Case remains calendared in Branch 22.  Final pre-trial scheduled for September 28, 2015 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for October 21, 2015 at 09:00 am.
State's Motion to Adjourn Jury Trial received and filed.
Witness list - defendant received and filed.

Defendant Miranda North in court with attorney Rodney L. Cubbie.  Randy P. Sitzberger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Case in court for final pre-trial.  Case remains calendared for Jury Trial in Branch 22 on 8/26/2015 at 9:00am.  State rescinded their offer.
Defense Proposed jury instructions recevied and filed.

Defendant Miranda North in court with attorney Rodney L. Cubbie.  Marissa Luz Santiago appeared for the State of Wisconsin./ SAB
Court grants defense Motion to Adjourn the jury trial. Case calendared for FINAL PRETRIAL on 8/6/2015 at 1:30 pm and JURY TRIAL on 8/26/2015 at 9:00 am.   Parties advised effective August 1, 2015, this case will be reassigned to Judge Witkowiak, Branch 22, Room 608 of the Courthouse.
Filed: State's Witness List, State's Motion in Limine, State's Requested Jury Instructions received and filed. sab
Miranda North's Motion to Adjourn Trial received and filed. sab

Defendant Miranda North in court with attorney Rodney L. Cubbie.  Marissa Luz Santiago appeared for the State of Wisconsin./ SAB
State is not opposing defense Motion to Sever. Court grants Motion to Sever this case from 15CF421. Case calendared for FINAL PRETRIAL on 6/1/2015 at 8:30 am and JURY TRIAL on 6/17/2015 at 9:00 am in Branch 15. Pretrial Scheduling Order signed and filed.

Certification of transcript of proceedings of PRELIMINARY HEARING commencing 02/04/2015 received and filed. (20 pages)
Copy of transcript forwarded to Rodney L. Cubbie 3333 North Mayfair Road #312 Wauwatosa, WI 53222.

Defendant Miranda North in court with attorney Rodney L. Cubbie.  Marissa Luz Santiago appeared for the State of Wisconsin./ SAB
State needs time to review Atty. Cubbie's (co-defendant counsel) motion to sever. Case calendared for STATUS on 3/25/2015 at 8:30 am in Branch 15.

Defendant Miranda North in court with attorney Rodney L. Cubbie. Megan Williamson for Denis John Stingl appeared for the State of Wisconsin./ SAB
ADA Stingl is in trial in another court. Case calendared for STATUS on 3/16/2015 at 8:30 am in Branch 15.
Miranda North's Motion to Sever Defendants, received and filed. sab

Defendant Miranda North in court with attorney Rodney L. Cubbie.  Laura Crivello for Denis John Stingl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defense will be filing a Motion to Sever from co-defendant.  Status conference scheduled for March 3, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Preliminary hearing proceeded.  Sworn for the state:Michael Lopez-MPD Officer.  State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original information received and filed;  defendant given a copy, waived reading, was arraigned in open court and pleads not guilty.  Case is adjourned to Branch 15.

Defendant Miranda North in court with attorney Rodney L. Cubbie.  Nicole J. Sheldon appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Request for Substitution of Judge received and filed.  Court consented to substitution against Judge Stark.  Parties are advised the Clerk of Circuit Court reassigned case pursuant to current court rules to Judge Watts, Br. 15.  Scheduling conference scheduled for February 16, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Court ordered ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY; no possession of any drugs without a valid prescription; no possession of any weapons or firearms.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with with the co-defendant Thomas L. Cage.

Defendant Miranda North in court with attorney Rodney L. Cubbie.  Zachary A. Wittchow appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge McAdams, Branch 7. Defendant given a copy of complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT DOES NOT QUALIFY FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.   Case is adjourned for a Preliminary Hearing in Branch PE.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for February 4, 2015 at 08:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Miranda North
Current: 7081 N. 44th Street, Milwaukee, WI 53233   (Effective: 01-27-2015)
Prior: 901 West Winnebago Street #213, Milwaukee, WI 53233
Defendant is Out-of-Custody. Court appearance in Out-Of-Custody Court, Room 221 Safety Building on 1/27/15 @ 1:30 pm
